articles.title: So, Nakamura in quick draw, arrange tiebreaker for Grand Prix title - Rappler
articles.description: Foreign-born Americans Wesley So and Hikaru Nakamura opt for a quick draw in the second game of their FIDE Grand Prix third leg final
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines What was supposed to be a classical title duel between Wesley So and Hikaru Nakamura has been transformed into a rapid tiebreaker.
